item.content:encoded:
Last week, we shed our boots and scarves and went to WordCamp Orlando to talk about multilingual content management. While it may be easy to
use WordPress in our own language, managing a multilingual site is another kettle of fish! We outlined the best content management practices and interface presentation for multilingual content (never, never, never Google Translate, and never use a little flag as a language selector!), then we analyzed the strengths and weaknesses of the solutions available. item.content:encoded:
Desaulniers Simard is at Gate 80, awaiting shipment to San Francisco.
Why San Francisco? Because WordCamp San Francisco is this weekend, the
patriarch of all WordCamps, the one where Matt Mullenweg, creator of
WordPress, gives his annual State of the Word, named after the
American president’s annual State of the Union Address.

The following week is the first edition of the WooCommerce Conference,
a two-day event devoted to the popular WordPress ecommerce platform.
We’ll be there too, and we’ll be posting about our experiences during
these two events. You can also follow our Twitter account for even
faster bulletins.

item.title: We are Affiliated Woo Workers
item.dc:creator: Alexandre
item.description:
Desaulniers Simard has been approved by WooThemes and is now part of the Affiliated Woo Workers official directory.

Cet article We are Affiliated Woo Workers est apparu en premier sur Desaulniers Simard.
item.content:encoded:
Desaulniers Simard has been approved by WooThemes and is now part of the Affiliated Woo Workers official directory. We are the second in Canada and first in Québec upon which this honour has been bestowed. Affiliated Woo Workers are selected in recognition of the quality and scope of their customization work with WooThemes themes and WooCommerce plugin and extensions. We’re not going to lie, we’re a bit proud, here.

WooThemes is a pioneer of commercial solutions in the WordPress ecosystem. Founded in 2008, it was among the very first studios to offer WordPress themes for sale and it has grown ever since. In 2011, WooThemes launched WooCommerce, a plugin that transforms WordPress into a full-fledged e-commerce platform. As of today, WooCommerce powers 17,77% of all e-commerce sites in the world.

item.content:encoded:
WordCamp is an informal conference about WordPress organized by the local community. Since 2006, 346 similar conferences have been organized in 172 cities worlwide. This year marks the 6th edition of our local version, WordCamp Montreal.

We are pleased to announce that both of us have been selected as speakers again this year. Élise will present
Nous sommes heureuses d’annoncer que nous avons toutes les deux été retenues comme conférencières cette année encore. Élise présentera 10 façons de vendre en ligne avec WordPress (Ten ways to sell online with WordPress), from a simple Paypal button to the advanced functions of WooCommerce. An intense program for 45 minutes! For his part, Alexandre will tackle the somewhat obscure subject of CSS selectors and will speak on how to use them in WordPress.

In addition, Desaulniers Simard supports the organizing committee as a sponsor of the event. The Montreal WordPress community is lively and impassioned. We are proud to be part of it.
